item.title: Elon Musk criticism of Trump tax bill frustrates some Republicans: 'No place in Congress'
item.description: Elon Musk's comments on President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful bill" have divided House Republicans.

item.title: Virginia gubernatorial candidate Abigail Spanberger releases first ad, slams 'political nonsense'
item.description: Abigail Spanberger, the Democrat who is running to be the successor to Virginia Gov. Glenn Youngkin, released her first TV ad on Thursday.
